website_summaries.verdict: Although the Under Armour Highlight Delta 2 claims to be a non-bulky shoe, many users thought otherwise as they expressed disappointment with the shoe’s larger-than-actual sizing and the unnecessary space resulting from it. Some have also pointed out how it was a pale comparison to its predecessor. The redeeming quality of the shoe was its impressive comfort, but maybe it was not enough for consumers to think the Highlight Delta 2 is an excellent running shoe.
pros: Many users commended the minimal weight of the Under Armour Highlight Delta 2
One reviewer thought the upper gave a customized
The collar was still very comfortable despite its high ankle cut, said a runner
The shoe performed great on casual runs and brisk walks, a customer stated
The Threadborne ankle support felt like a sock, according to a tester
A purchaser was amazed at the outsole traction
cons: The heel cup was ineffective at keeping the foot from sliding, a user complained
Many runners did not like that the Highlight Delta 2 ran big, with some saying it was carelessly made
The midsole felt thinner and was not as bouncy compared to the previous version, several reviewers commented
The upper looked flimsy and delicate, a buyer wrote

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly light
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for some gym shoes and i came across these, and for the price i couldn't pass it up. the shoe looks better than the picture, while i haven't actually wore it to the gym yet, it actually feels comfortable and surprisingly light when i put it on at home. will update my review after 2mo wearing it to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Bain

customer_reviews.title: 69% off! Had to get them
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a lightweight run centric workout shoe. Received an email stating that my size in blue was on sale for 69% off in for a limited time and decided to go for it. They fit well and so far so good during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: flowynn

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall design and the one piece sock/bootie concept. I wish the material was a bit tighter fit over the top and sides of the foot. I have to cinch it tight to keep from feeling like I’m flopping around in clown shoes. I like they are very light and the sole moves nicely, but I could do with a little more cushioning. I have not done any serious runs in them and use them mostly for little run/walks with my dog around the neighborhood and occasionally at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kenny

customer_reviews.title: No socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, tennis shoes or what ever. They work great for me working out 4 to 5 times a week. I also love that I dont need socks with these. I have a couple other pairs that I use just for casual dress. Make more colors
customer_reviews.author: chhjr043

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy shoe. Runs really big. I'm a 12.5 or 13. I ordered a 12 and it's still a tad big. It has minimal internal structure. I think it will be OK for linear running and most weight lifting. But I wish it had a bit more support /structure. It looks great, with a minimalist style. I got the off white colorway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teenagers and their shoes
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son absolutely loves these. Maybe too much. My favorite thing is that they look good on. Some of the modern sneakers look like space boots. These look nice and fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9 175 pounds in great shape and I love UA products. These unfortunately were not worth the money at all for my feet. Not nearly enough support, feet move around too much. Great for walking around shoes, but I don't wear them in the gym anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Meh at best
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and these have very little support. But they look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. GREENE

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with purchase. Shoes were for my teen & he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour stepping it up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, wish I would’ve waited a little longer to save $20, but they’re super comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Design is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these shoes from past 3 months, fitting is so nice and comfortable. They are really feather weight at the same time strong enough to with stand rough usage. Everything is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Spaidim

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, for my flat feet, they feel great. I would definitely buy them again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C

customer_reviews.title: Great fit from Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: The Delta is comfortable and lightweight. More of a cross trainer than running shoe, I'd recommend it for light workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Slapper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made!! Had to glue a section of the sole back not worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dos la Tone

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Shoe wasn't bad. Sole started to tear up after moderate wear. Otherwise okay product
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great with jeans or casual wear.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive shoe and nice fit. However, not a good running shoe. It lacks support and comfort for any serious running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As an coach and personal trainer I need a shoe that is comfortable from day one. First time ordering, love ‘em!
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good, comfortable shoe, not stable enough to use as a running or training shoe, for casual use is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the way they feel on his foot! Very comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.author: JERI LAVIELLE

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for style not a fan of running or taking to the gym though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big but all around one of my favorite shoes from UA
customer_reviews.text: Solid running and training shoe. Runs a little big but all around one of my favorite shoes from UA
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Damn Shoe Ever lol
customer_reviews.text: The fit is awesome! The foam insoles and heel cup are very comfortable. I’m waiting to see if the ankle collar stretches out overtime but love it so far!!
customer_reviews.author: AJM858Official

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable like the first gen. But it does has a better look
customer_reviews.author: Walter Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE Comfort, no regrets. The minor gripe is putting it on but no major issues.
customer_reviews.author: AjMart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good fits great as work shoe for lots of walking and stair climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, they fit as expected, have great support and are super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: klooster

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a half size down and they fit great. These feel way more expensive that what I paid for them and I love working out in them. I dont really do long distance running but I do short runs of about 2 miles or so and they feel great. Really impressed with this shoe especially at the cost and they look pretty clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Royalewitcheese951

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: The design isn't for everyone but I love them my only complain is your gonna get some slippage with your lateral movement but that's common in fabric type shoes
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, takes some time getting used to putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Highlight Delta 2 Running Shoe, Black (002)/Steel, 12
product_meta.description: UA Highlight Delta 2 Mens in Black by Under Armour.
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Threadborne knit upper for a breathable, compression like fit that delivers lightweight directional strength
Reflective threads throughout upper to increase safety & visibility during low light training
Molded heel cup offers a form fit that keeps the foot from sliding
Ribbed ankle collar provides a snug, bootie like fit with an extended cut for unparalleled support
